# Set file paths
```{r}
data_path<-file.path('G:/Shared drives/SpaCE_Lab_FRUGIVORIA/data/plants/L0')
output_path<- file.path('G:/Shared drives/SpaCE_Lab_FRUGIVORIA/data/plants/L0')
```

# Install and load required packages
```{r}
library(rgbif)
library(mde)
library(DataExplorer)
library(summarytools)
library(bdvis)
```

# Set GBIF User information
```{r}
#only run once
#install.packages("usethis")
#usethis::edit_r_environ()
```
# Get Taxon Key for Plants
```{r}
name_backbone("Plantae")
```


```{r}
occ_download(
pred("taxonKey", 6), 
pred("hasGeospatialIssue", FALSE),
pred("hasCoordinate", TRUE),
pred("country","EC"),
pred("occurrenceStatus","PRESENT"), 
pred_not(pred_in("basisOfRecord",c("FOSSIL_SPECIMEN","LIVING_SPECIMEN"))),
format = "SIMPLE_CSV"
)
```
# Retrive GBIF download, save file, and load into r
```{r}
d <- occ_download_get("0253091-220831081235567", path = output_path) %>%
  occ_download_import()
```

# Summary 
```{r}
summary(d)
```

```{r}
# using mde package
na_summary(d, exclude_cols = c("gbifID"))
```

```{r}
# using DataExplorer package
plot_str(d)
introduce(d)
plot_intro(d)
plot_missing(d)
plot_bar(d)
```

```{r}
# using summarytools package
d_summary <- dfSummary(d, 
            na.col       = FALSE,
            style        = "multiline",
            plain.ascii  = TRUE,
            graph.magnif = .8)
print(d_summary, method = "render")
view(d_summary, file = file.path(output_path,"Ecuador_BIEN_traits_summary.html"))
```

```{r}
#using bdvis package
d <- format_bdvis(d, , Latitude = "decimalLatitude", Longitude = "decimalLongitude", Date_collected = "eventDate", Scientific_name = "scientificName", Family = "family", Genus = "genus")
```

```{r}
bdsummary(d)
d$Date_collected <- as.Date(d$Date_collected)
bdcalendarheat(d)
getcellid(d, gridscale = 10)
distrigraph(d, ptype = "species")
distrigraph(d, ptype = "efforts")
distrigraph(d, ptype = "cell")
distrigraph(d, ptype = "effortspecies")
bdcomplete(d)
mapgrid(d, ptype = "species", region = "Ecuador")
```


# Write data to csv
```{r}
Ecuador_GBIF_path <- file.path(output_path,"Ecuador_GBIF_occurences.csv") 
write.csv(d, file = Ecuador_GBIF_path)
```
